items.title: POPI Fundamentals
items.headline: Know what POPI (the Protection of Personal Information Act) is all about.
objectives_summary: This course will provide you with a basic understanding of the Protection of Personal Information (POPI) Act.
What is POPI?
Where does POPI come from?

items.title: Step by Step GDPR Compliance for EU Based Small Businesses

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Smith
visible_instructors.job_title: Data Privacy and Protection Expert and Business Owner

items.headline: For experienced IT and Computer Literate people who have a good understanding of computers and operating systems.
objectives_summary: Gain a practical application of Data Privacy (GDPR) and how it is applied to your small business.
Demonstrate that your small business is Data Privacy compliant and knows how to manage Personal Data.
Know what to do when working with other small businesses to ensure your Personal Data is safe.

items.title: European Medical Device Regulatory Basics
items.headline: A beginner's primer to medical device regulation in Europe.
objectives_summary: Be able to tell differences between EU and US approach to medical device regulation
Understand how to begin the regulatory process in EU for your device
Have a basis for pursuing further information on EU medical device regulation

items.title: Nanotechnology Law & Policy
items.headline: Nanotechnology, Law and Society
objectives_summary: iidentify statutes and regulations and policies that regulate nanotechnology and the federal agencies that apply these laws.

items.title: Interface of Artificial Intelligence & Intellectual Property
items.headline: Patent Law & AI; Copyright Law & AI; Trade Secrets & AI; Infringement & Liability of AI related technology
objectives_summary: Basics of AI related technology and its protection under Intellectual Property Law.
Ownership & Authorship of AI related inventions & work.
Principles of liability for loss caused by AI and limitation of liability.

items.title: Technology and Innovation for Legal Professionals
items.headline: The ultimate course for legal professionals to become tech-savvy and have a competitive edge in the legal market

Identify each coverage available to your business.

items.title: How create GDPR Data Protection culture in your organisation

items.title: Space Law 301
items.headline: Space Treaties and UN Space Declarations
objectives_summary: Building on Space Law 101 and Space Law 201, students will learn in Space Law 301 the detailed aspects of all of the major space law treaties.
Identify the objectives and principles of the five major space treaties.
Identify the applicable space treaty for space law scenarios.
